nodes.name: GAccounts

nodes.documentation:
@dev The constructor sets the original `authorities` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the minter.
nodes.name: onlyMinter

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current OWNER!!! to transfer control of the contract to a newMinter. newMinter is likely to be the land register contract.
@param newMinter The address to transfer mintership to.
nodes.name: transferMintership

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the trader.
nodes.name: onlyTrader

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current OWNER!!! to transfer control of the contract to a newTrader.
@param newTrader The address to transfer mintership to.
nodes.name: transferTradership
